title: Jinx Skin
body: As a player that plays Jinx quite a bit, I am hanging out for a new Jinx skin. Riot was saying that she is such a hard champion to create a skin for due to her having three different guns with completely unique characteristics. I have seen some pretty rad fan concept art of Harley Quinn Jinx, Retro Jinx and Cyberpunk Jinx and they all look really amazing. Riot, can you get on this please. This "Loose Cannon" is in desperate need of some love.

replies.body: We thought she needed a new look, too! Firecracker Jinx just hit the PBE! :3

i kno right... i've spent entirely too much money on this game but i've been dying for a jinx skin. decisions to make...

I mean I just bought Elise with RP so I can buy her blood moon skin, then I had to buy the blood moon icon cause why not? Now I'm thinking about buying Jinx with RP so I can buy this skin, but so far I want to buy the new Katarina skin too.  You're killing me guys I gotta budget myself T_T
Thank you for this.. I've been wanting and expecting a Jinx skin fitting this exact theme for MONTHS. Whoever the team behind this skin is I LOVE them

She deserves at least an inspired 1350 skin or even of higher quality. The reason of Jinx being unable to get a new skin because she has too many animations and complicated design seems redundant to me because why would they even create such a champion at the first place if they couldn't cater to its needs in the future.

im not even sure you could consider that an excuse because they always seem to use it. eg Udyr not getting a skin for the longest time until a rework but ended up getting the Ultimate skin, same with Rumble too outdated, but able to play the Super Galaxy skin. and again with Eve, granted hers was a 750 skin, but if thats the case they should be making more 750 skins especially for champs who havent gotten a skin in their recent years!
Firecracker jinx fits her theme so much.  I understand what Riot was trying to do with Mafia Jinx but they didn't pull off the skin concept just right.  I'll be buying firecracker jinx.

Harley Quinn is one of the coolest people ever and I really think it would be an awesome skin. By the way Riot is talking it's quite a remarkable Jinx skin in the works and with as long as it's taking it wouldn't surprise me if it's the next Ultimate Skin (3250RP)
It would make my year if the Ultimate Skin was for Jinx. Although, I have heard quite a lot of hype of the Ultimate Skin being DJ Sona so I am unsure of what Riot is thinking.
I have heard the same thing. I hope that's not true. Sona is garbage and has plenty of skins as it is.. And that skin just sounds ridiculous.
OMG!!! Yes! I want  a new skin for jinx soo bad. I play her all the time. It's so sad because i have skins for all the other champions I play but not her {{champion:32}}
